Lib Manager

Overview

The lib_manager library provides functionality to dynamically manage libraries in MARS. Note that plugins in MARS have to be loaded and are handled as libraries.

To be used with a Libmanager, all libraries (and thus, plugins) have to implement the interface LibInterface specified in this library.
